sentences.sContent: The reforms were attacked in a highly polemical piece in the ‘New Yorker’.
sentences.sCn: 《纽约客》一篇措辞强硬的文章猛烈抨击了这些改革。

synos.tran: 好辩的；好争论的；挑起论战的

trans.tranCn: 辩论法, 辩论术, 好辩的, 挑起争端的
trans.tranOther: using strong arguments to criticize or defend a particular idea, opinion, or person
